node_2: best motion picture – drama golden globe
edge: The Social Network won the Best Motion Picture – Drama Golden Globe at the 68th Golden Globe Awards on January 16, 2011.

node_2: best actor in a leading role
edge: The film was nominated for Best Actor in a Leading Role (Eisenberg) at the 68th Golden Globe Awards on January 16, 2011.

node_2: best actor in a supporting role
edge: The film was nominated for Best Actor in a Supporting Role (Garfield) at the 68th Golden Globe Awards on January 16, 2011.
The film was nominated for Rising Star Award (Garfield) at the 68th Golden Globe Awards on January 16, 2011.
